responseText: I see! Please assure your friend that I have the utmost respect for the plight of her people! Do you know that I was taught that their heritage stories were fanciful myth? That is not what I've found in these encampments! Beside that, I fear that our Vaelune friends suffered a great deal in thier flight to the Portal in Aela, much more than has been said. I believe there are great stories to be told here.
name: SQ_NOC_RVR_Samias_Miraleth_MartinSwift_11_Response
